title: About Rowan Weismiller | Designer & Developer

Background

I studied interaction design at SFU, worked at Mobify for over 2 years in an interdisciplinary marketing team, then left to work as a contractor. After a year of helping clients with front-end execution, Iâ€™m joining the team at Bench for a new adventure as a front-end software engineer.

Find me in the Vancouver design & development community helping organize the bi-monthly Style & Class meetup as well as the yearly SIAT Design Jam. I speak publicly, too, but I donâ€™t have any videos to share with you. ðŸ˜©
